metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14529 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: The pe_print_idata function in peXXigen.c in the Binary File Descriptor(BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.29, mishandlesHintName vector entries, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (heap-based buffer over-read and application crash) via a craftedPE file, related to the bfd_getl16 function.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
